alert.note: Alert for Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN GLYNN COUNTY THROUGH 215 PM EDT... At 144 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms over St. Simons Island, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. Winds around 40 mph have been measured at surface stations. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, St Simons Island Village, Country Club Estates, Jekyll Island, and Sea Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
